attributeList.name: basis_rot_samples
attributeList.doc: List of samples for each grouping of the basis-rotated Hamiltonian terms

attributeList.name: basis_rot_groupings
attributeList.doc: List of grouped Hamiltonian terms obtained using [`qml.qchem.basis_rotation`](https://docs.pennylane.ai/en/stable/code/api/pennylane.qchem.basis_rotation.html)

attributeList.name: dipole_op
attributeList.doc: Qubit dipole moment operators for the chemical system

attributeList.name: fci_energy
attributeList.doc: Ground state energy of the molecule obtained from exact diagonalization

attributeList.name: fci_spectrum
attributeList.doc: First `2 × #qubits` eigenvalues obtained from exact diagonalization

attributeList.name: hamiltonian
attributeList.doc: Hamiltonian of the system in the Pauli basis

attributeList.name: hf_state
attributeList.doc: Hartree-Fock state of the chemical system represented by a binary vector

attributeList.name: molecule
attributeList.doc: PennyLane Molecule object containing description for the system and basis set

attributeList.name: number_op
attributeList.doc: Qubit operator for computing total spin 𝑆<sup>2</sup> for the chemical system

attributeList.name: optimal_sector
attributeList.doc: Eigensector of the tapered qubits that would contain the ground state

attributeList.name: paulix_ops
attributeList.doc: Supporting PauliX ops required to build Clifford 𝑈 for tapering

attributeList.name: qwc_groupings
attributeList.doc: List of grouped qubit-wise commuting Hamiltonian terms obtained using [`qml.pauli.optimize_measurements`](https://docs.pennylane.ai/en/stable/code/api/pennylane.pauli.optimize_measurements.html)

attributeList.name: qwc_samples
attributeList.doc: List of samples for each grouping of the qubit-wise commuting Hamiltonian terms

attributeList.name: sparse_hamiltonian
attributeList.doc: Sparse matrix representation of a Hamiltonian in the computational basis

attributeList.name: spin2_op
attributeList.doc: Qubit operator for computing total spin 𝑆<sup>2</sup> for the chemical system

attributeList.name: spinz_op
attributeList.doc: Qubit operator for computing total spin’s projection in 𝑍 direction

attributeList.name: symmetries
attributeList.doc: Symmetries required for tapering molecular Hamiltonian

attributeList.name: tapered_dipole_op
attributeList.doc: Tapered dipole moment operator

attributeList.name: tapered_hamiltonian
attributeList.doc: Tapered Hamiltonia

attributeList.name: tapered_hf_state
attributeList.doc: Tapered Hartree-Fock state of the molecule

attributeList.name: tapered_num_op
attributeList.doc: Tapered number operator

attributeList.name: tapered_spin2_op
attributeList.doc: Tapered total spin operator

attributeList.name: tapered_spinz_op
attributeList.doc: Tapered spin projection operator

attributeList.name: vqe_energy
attributeList.doc: Energy obtained from the state prepared by the optimized circuit

attributeList.name: vqe_gates
attributeList.doc: [`SingleExcitation`](https://docs.pennylane.ai/en/stable/code/api/pennylane.SingleExcitation.html#pennylane.SingleExcitation) and [`DoubleExcitation`](https://docs.pennylane.ai/en/stable/code/api/pennylane.DoubleExcitation.html#pennylane.DoubleExcitation) gates for the optimized circuit

attributeList.name: vqe_params
attributeList.doc: Optimal parameters for the gates that prepares ground state
